description: Looking for articles written by Madeleine Chill? Check out all of Madeleine Chill's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogMadeleine Chill Content Marketing Manager Madeleine Chill Madeleine is the Content Marketing Manager for Similarweb's Sales Intelligence platform. A lifelong language lover, she's pretty thrilled to have a career that consists of what she'd want to be doing anyway. Sales and marketing (smarketing, anyone?) are her content wheelhouses. Offline, her favorite things are vegetable gardens, late-night cookie baking, and apocalypse books.
